name: Infinite Darkness (Monnowverse Studios)
description:
An endless arcade style of game where you must survive the longest!

Join my Discord here for updates - https://discord.monnowverse.com/

Infinite Darkness V0.0.3

It includes the following

  • Health system with pickups
  • Wave based enemy spawning
  • Main menu with options menu
  • Pause menu
  • Death screen with current score

I do plan on building upon this prototype in the future.

Features I plan on adding

  • Loading high scores
  • Controls page
  • Different enemies with abilities
  • A new map 
  • Minimap
  • Full controller support
  • Menu/level music
  • Better sound effects
  • More weapons and upgrades
  • Powerups

This game is a very early prototype - Expect bugs and only basic gameplay!

Suggestions welcome

Prototype made following course by GameDev.tv
